Articles.Content:
Just throwing this in:

[http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown)
What are squad's working hours? it should be released within that time
Yes, good morning hype train! I hope everyone's ready for one more day of hyping!

> 
> Why would you hope I'm wrong when 2pm CDT is about 6 hours away and the "Riddle Time" is about 2 hours away? Do you want it to be released later?

you suggested that KSP will update at 6pm CDT and that is early morning 28th for me...
Let the f5 madness begin!
So if no major catastrophe or famous person dies today what are the odds of us getting the 1.0 launch to stay on [this](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/April_27) page for more than 2 minutes?
Does it usually take more than 18 hours to migrate servers? Are they slow land bound creatures or can they fly?
08.00 A.M. in Mexico City, should not be long now....

> 
> Does it usually take more than 18 hours to migrate servers? Are they slow land bound creatures or can they fly?

In my experience that is slow. I have migrated a server with over 200gb of media and it did not take that long. Lots of factors in play though, I don't know exactly what they are doing.
Let the insane F5ing start.
it will all be timed to update together
[http://i.imgur.com/Z6qGXXM.gif](http://i.imgur.com/Z6qGXXM.gif)
AGGGHHH!! Can the train handle the hype-velocity!?!?!?!?!

Again, morning everybody!

Also, HYPE ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/Z6qGXXM.gif](http://i.imgur.com/Z6qGXXM.gif)

This is all of us right now.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> AGGGHHH!! Can the train handle the hype-velocity!?!?!?!?!

Of course!!!
What do Kerbals listen to in their spare time? I wanna psych myself up for the release...

> 
> What kind of weird joo joo are they running that my phone gets the image and my computer gets text?

That's interesting. Mobile obviously ends up at a different address.

Happy landings!
what's the (maybe previous) hype record, 243 pages?
I once again have my 'It's Happening!' gif fully loaded and ready to fire.

> 
> what's the (maybe previous) hype record, 243 pages?

298 Actually, or 297, so, we have 50 pages to go here.

> 
> What do Kerbals listen to in their spare time? I wanna psych myself up for the release...

Hm, I'm pretty sure if there's a Kerbal version of me in the Kerbal universe, he's trying to eat a #2 lead pencil.

> 
> That's interesting. Mobile obviously ends up at a different address.
> Happy landings!

According to my browser it doesn't which is really freaking me out...
We need to add more boosters soon! ALL THE HYPE!

> 
> What do Kerbals listen to in their spare time? I wanna psych myself up for the release...

I'm gonna guess Danger Zone by Kenny Loggins...

> 
> what's the (maybe previous) hype record, 243 pages?

People told me it was 200, then they changed it to 300. I don't know anything anymore.
